description: A team with 2 agents - an AssistantAgent (with a calculator tool) and a CriticAgent in a SelectorGroupChat team.
label: Selector Team_17415

participants.description: An agent for planning tasks, this agent should be the first to engage when given a new task.
participants.label: PlanningAgent

config.name: planning_agent

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
config.system_message:
You are a planning agent.
        Your job is to break down complex tasks into smaller, manageable subtasks.
        Your team members are:
            WebSearchAgent: Searches for information
            DataAnalystAgent: Performs calculations

        You only plan and delegate tasks - you do not execute them yourself.

        When assigning tasks, use this format:
        1. <agent> : <task>

        After all tasks are complete, summarize the findings and end with "TERMINATE".

participants.description: An agent that provides assistance with tool use.
participants.label: WebSearchAgent

config.name: web_search_agent
search_web_tool

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: an agent that critiques and improves the assistant's output
config.system_message:
You are a web search agent.
        Your only tool is search_tool - use it to find information.
        You make only one search call at a time.
        Once you have the results, you never do calculations based on them.

config.name: assistant_agent

config.source_code:
def percentage_change_tool(start: float, end: float) -> float:
        return ((end - start) / start) * 100
config.name: percentage_change_tool
config.description: A simple calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
config.system_message:
You are a data analyst.
        Given the tasks you have been assigned, you should analyze the data and provide results using the tools provided.
        If you have not seen the data, ask for it.

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation if a specific text is mentioned.
conditions.label: TextMentionTermination

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation after a maximum number of messages have been exchanged.
conditions.label: MaxMessageTermination

config.selector_prompt:
You are in a role play game. The following roles are available:
{roles}.
Read the following conversation. Then select the next role from {participants} to play. Only return the role.

{history}

Read the above conversation. Then select the next role from {participants} to play. Only return the role.
